thread.title: BRIEF-China Galaxy Securities issues 2018 first tranche corporate bonds worth totaling 5 bln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Galaxy Securities issues 2018 first tranche corporate bonds worth totaling 5 bln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - china galaxy securities co ltd

text:
Jan 18(Reuters) - China Galaxy Securities Co Ltd
* Says it issues 2-year 2018 first tranche corporate bonds worth 3.5 billion yuan and 3-year 2018 first tranche corporate bonds worth 1.5 billion yuan, with coupon rate of 5.55 percent and 5.65 percent respectively
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/6UT9AW
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
